thread.title: A lovely central hotel hidden away from the hustle & bustle, for a very enjoyable afternoon tea!
thread.title_full: A lovely central hotel hidden away from the hustle & bustle, for a very enjoyable afternoon tea! - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AMJJ-1
title: A lovely central hotel hidden away from the hustle & bustle, for a very enjoyable afternoon tea!
text: Visited this lovely hotel for afternoon tea and it was a really enjoyable afternoon, in a really good central location. We came here before the theatre and it was the perfect place to unwind before heading off to theatre land. The afternoon tea was great, and next time I visit the theatre I am very tempted to stay here the night as it was elegant, so central, and yet nicely tucked away from the hustle and bustle.
